name: Running Amo
description:
This is a simple platformer game with 20 levels. 

Use arrow keys to move.

Touch the mango to go to the next level.

Final level: fight the boss. Press Z to throw orange, press X to throw mango at the boss.

The boss's life is 1000.  1 orange => the boss's life will be subtracted 1.

                                                     1 mango => the boss's life will be subtracted 10.
